channel.title: code sketch on RILLA KHALED
channel.description: Recent content in code sketch on RILLA KHALED

item.title: Machine Translation
item.description: Machine Translation Do you know the apocryphal machine translation story from the late 1950s, where the text "the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak" became "the vodka is good but the meat is rotten"? Today's code sketch pays homage to that. Click on any of the words below to see what WordsAPI rustles up as a synonym (no substitutions made means WordsAPI had no synonyms to offer).

item.title: Space Time
item.description: Space time Where are we? During dinner the other day, our friend Jhave reminded us of the incredible difficulty of trying to retain in mind the idea that time is space. So consider the image a clock of sorts, that renders differently based on what time it is for you. Or where in the world you choose to be.

item.title: Remember 1996?
item.description: Remember 1996? i remember when only 8 people in the country made a living off of web design that country was New Zealand; "view source" felt like looking at the internet's undies.

item.title: Only Two
item.description: Fast, cheap, good. This much is true. You can't have three, but you can have two. Other (common) cases no one bothers to mention: one | none.
